add_library(lerc STATIC
            BitMask.cpp  BitMask.h  BitStuffer2.cpp  BitStuffer2.h  Defines.h  Huffman.cpp  Huffman.h  Lerc.cpp
            Lerc.h  Lerc2.cpp  Lerc2.h  Lerc_c_api.h  Lerc_c_api_impl.cpp  Lerc_types.h  RLE.cpp  RLE.h)
set_property(TARGET lerc PROPERTY POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
target_link_libraries(GDAL_LINK_LIBRARY INTERFACE lerc)
